column4: How do I figure out what is locking my /var/cache/apt/archives/lock?
you have two programs open for updating.  Like synaptic open while trying to use apt-get or two synaptics, that sort of thing
bulmer I know what tends to lock it... but I don't have anything open other then a terminal and its locked
oh weird.  Are you forgetting to sudo?
bulmer ok I did a sudo lsof | grep apt  apt-get seems to have the /var/cache/apt/archives/lock open but I'm not running it...
